definitions.definition: Any of several devices used to loosen or stir the soil , either to remove weeds or to provide aeration and drainage .
examples: As the crop gets bigger, the shank spacing on the cultivator will need to be adjusted accordingly.

subdefinitions.definition: Someone who uses a cultivator (implement, device, or machine).
examples: The cultivators were out among the row crops, keeping the weeds in check.
She was a devoted cultivator of roses and orchids.

subdefinitions.definition: Someone who fosters something besides plants (such as human development or relationships).
examples: She was a wonderful cultivator of potential in her direct reports.

main_definition: Any of several devices used to loosen or stir the soil , either to remove weeds or to provide aeration and drainage .
